Title: Patrik, Age 1.5
Actors: Gustaf Skarsgård, Torkel Petersson, Tom Ljungman, Amanda Davin
Plot: Goran and Sven have been cleared for adoption and are given the option to adopt Swedish orphan "Patrik 1,5," but when Patrik arrives, he turns out not to be the little boy they were expecting. A comma was misplaced, and the boy they receive is a 15-year-old homophobe with a criminal past.
Production: Filmlance International AB, Film i Väst, Sveriges Television, Sonet Film AB
